text: Description Do you want to work with one of Canadaa€s top companies represented by an award-winning staffing agency? Look no further and join the Spirit circle today! Our client is looking for General and Semi Skilled Labourers: What's in it for you? Meaningful work while proudly supporting Albertans, with the possibility of extension or permanent placement. Full time shifts in Calgary, AB. Representation by an award-winning staffing agency that invests in you professionally and takes the time to guide you through the process. Did we pique your interest yet? If you have strong experience in a similar role then we want to hear from you! APPLY TODAY. Must Have: Strong Work Ethic. 10-12 Hour Shifts. Reliable Transportation. WHIMIS Certification. Fall Arrest Certification. Preferred Roofing Experience, although no experience is not an issue. Must work 5-6 days a week. Must own Steel Toe CSA Approved boots. APPLY ASAP. We thank all applicants for applying, however only those considered for an interview will be contacted directly. Looking for more opportunities? Check out our website at www. spiritomega. org. Don't see a posting that suits you? Apply to our "General Application" and our recruiters will get in touch when they have a job that fits you! Follow us "Spirit Staffing & Consulting Inc" on Linked. In, Facebook, and Twitter for all our new postings. We thank all applicants for applying, however only those considered for an interview will be contacted directly. Looking for more opportunities? Check out our job board at httpsfastlaboursolutions. applytojob. com/apply. Don't see a posting that suits you? Apply to our "General Application" and our recruiters will get in touch when they have a job that fits you! Follow us "Fast Labour Solutions" on Linked. In, Facebook, and Twitter FastLabour for all our new postings. Powered by JazzHR.

Description

Do you want to work with one of Canada\u00e2\u20ac\u2122s top companies represented by an award-winning staffing agency? Look no further and join the Spirit circle today!

Our client is looking for General and Semi Skilled Labourers:

What's in it for you? 

  • Meaningful work while proudly supporting Albertans, with the possibility of extension or permanent placement
  • Full time shifts in Calgary, AB
  • Representation by an award-winning staffing agency that invests in you professionally and takes the time to guide you through the process

Did we pique your interest yet? If you have strong experience in a similar role then we want to hear from you! APPLY TODAY

 

Must Have:

  • Strong Work Ethic
  • 10-12 Hour Shifts
  • Reliable Transportation
  • WHIMIS Certification
  • Fall Arrest Certification
  • Preferred Roofing Experience, although no experience is not an issue
  • Must work 5-6 days a week
  • Must own Steel Toe CSA Approved boots

 

APPLY ASAP 

**We thank all applicants for applying, however only those considered for an interview will be contacted directly**

 

Looking for more opportunities? Check out our website at www.spiritomega.org

Don't see a posting that suits you? Apply to our \"General Application\" and our recruiters will get in touch when they have a job that fits you!

Follow us \"Spirit Staffing & Consulting Inc\" on LinkedIn, Facebook, and Twitter for all our new postings

**We thank all applicants for applying, however only those considered for an interview will be contacted directly**

Looking for more opportunities? Check out our job board at https://fastlaboursolutions.applytojob.com/apply

Don't see a posting that suits you? Apply to our \"General Application\" and our recruiters will get in touch when they have a job that fits you!

Follow us \"Fast Labour Solutions\" on LinkedIn, Facebook, and Twitter @FastLabour for all our new postings

Powered by JazzHR
